documents.document:
Help

I dont know what im supposed to put here

Why im here

hi all
about two months ago
i was drunk (as usual)
a girl came upto me said how i beautiful i looked
then kissed me and walked away

i havent stopped thinking about her since

im still looking for you if you are here

but i dont mind meeting friends whilst looking for you

The Difference Between Women and Men

NAMES
If Laurie, Linda, Elizabeth and Barbara go out for lunch, they will call each other Laurie, Linda, Elizabeth and Barbara. If Mark, Chris, Eric and Tom go out, they will affectionately refer to each other as Fat Boy, Godzilla, Peanut-Head and Scrappy.

EATING OUT
When the bill arrives, Mark, Chris, Eric and Tom will each throw in a £20, even though it's only for £32.50. None of them will have anything smaller and none will actually admit they want change back. When the women get their bill, out come the pocket calculators.

MONEY
A man will pay £2 for a £1 item he needs. A woman will pay £1 for a £2 item that she doesn't need, but it's on sale.

BATHROOMS
A man has five items in his bathroom: a toothbrush, shaving cream, razor, a bar of soap, and a towel from the Holiday Inn. The average number of items in the typical woman's bathroom is 337. A man would not be able to identify most of these items

ARGUMENTS
A woman has the last word in any argument. Anything a man says after that is the beginning of a new argument.

CATS
Women love cats. Men say they love cats, but when women aren't looking, men kick cats.

FUTURE
A woman worries about the future until she gets a husband. A man never worries about the future until he gets a wife.

SUCCESS
A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.

MARRIAGE
A woman marries a man expecting he will change, but he doesn't. A man marries a woman expecting that she won't change ,and she does.

DRESSING UP
A woman will dress up to go shopping, water the plants, empty the rubbish bin, answer the phone, read a book, and get the mail. A man will dress up for weddings and funerals.

NATURAL
Men wake up as good-looking as they went to bed. Women somehow deteriorate during the night.

OFFSPRING
Ah, children. A woman knows all about her children. She knows about dentist appointments and romances, best friends, favorite foods, secret fears and hopes and dreams. A man is vaguely aware of some short people living in the house

THOUGHT FOR THE DAY
Any married man should forget his mistakes. There's no use in two people remembering the same thing.

Wise old woman

An older woman gets pulled over for speeding:

Older Woman: Is there a problem officer?
Officer Ma'am you were speeding
Older Woman: Oh I see
Officer: Can I see your license please
Older Woman: I'd give it to you but I don't have one
Officer: Don"t Have one?
Older Woman I lost it four years ago for drunk driving
Officer: May I see your vehicle registration papers please
Older Woman: I can" do that
Officer: Why?
Older Woman: I stole the car
Officer: Stole it?
Oder Woman: Yes and I killed and hacked up the owner
Officer: You what
Older Woman: His body parts are in plastic bags in the trunk if you want to see.

The officer slowly backs away to his car and calls for backup. Within minutes five police cars circle the car. A senior officer slowly approaches the vehicle clasping his half drawn gun.

Officer 2: Could you step out of the vehicle please
The woman steps out of her vehicle
Older woman: Is there a problem ?
Officer: One of my officers told me you have stolen this car and murdered the owner
Older woman: murdered the owner?
Officer2: Could you open the trunk please
The woman opens it to reveal an empty trunk.
Officer2: Is this your car ma"am?
Older Woman: Yes here are the registration papers

The officer is quite stunned!
Officer2; one of my officers claim you do not have a drivers license
The woman digs in her handbag pulls out a clutch purse and hands it to the officer.
Officer2; Examines the license and looks quite puzzled
Officer2; Thank you ma"am one of my officers told me that you did not have a license you stole the car and murdered the owner.
Older woman: Bet the liar told you I was speeding too!

Tickets please

Three engineers and three accountants were travelling by train to a conference. At the station the three accountants all purchased a ticket and watched as only one engineer bought a ticket.
How are three people going to travel on one ticket asked an accountant Wait and you'll see said the engineer.
They all boarded the train. the accountants all took their respective seats, but all the engineers crammed into the restroom, and closed the door behind them.Shortly after the train departed the conductor came around collecting tickets. he knocked on the restroom door and said ticket please.
The door opened just a crack and a single arm emerged with a ticket in hand. the conductor took it and moved on. The accountants seen this and agreeded this was a clever idea. So after the conference the accountants decided to copy the engineers on the return trip and save some money (being clever with money and all that)
When they got to the station they bought a single ticket for the return trip To their astonishment the engineers didn't buy a ticket at all. How are you going to ride without a ticket asked the perplexed accountant. Watch and see said the engineer.
When they boarded the train the three accountants crammed into a restroom and the three engineers crammed into another one nearby The train departed and shortly after one of the engineers left the restroom and walked over to where the accountants were were hiding He knocked on the door and said ticket please

Who is Jack Schitt?

The lineage is finally being revealed. Many people are at a loss for a response when someone says "You don't know Jack Schitt!" Now you can intellectually handle the situation.

Jack Schitt is the onlly son of Awe Schitt and O Schitt. Awe Schitt the fertilizer magnet married O Schitt the owner of Knee-Deep N Schitt Inc.

In turn JACK married Noe Schitt and the deeply religious couple produced six children: Hollie Schitt Fulla Schitt Giva Schitt Bull Schitt and the twins Deep Schitt and Dip Schitt

Against his parent objections Deep Schitt married Dumb Schitt a high school dropout.After being married for fifteen years Jack and Noe Schitt divorced.

Noe Schitt later married Mr Sherlock and because her kids were living with her she wanted to keep her previous name. She was then known as Noe Shit Sherlock

Dip Schitt maried Loda Schitt a very distant cousin and they produce a very nervous son Chicken Schitt

Fulla Schitt and Giva Schitt were inseperable throughout childhood and subsequently married the Happens Brothers in a dual ceremony. the Wedding Announcement in the newspaper announced the Schitt Happens wedding. The Schitt Happens children were named Dawg Byrd and Hoarse.

Bull Schitt the prodigal son left home to tour the world . he recently returned from Italy with his new bride Pisa Schitt.

So now when someone says "You don't know Jack Schitt" you can accurately correct them

Caught

An old man lived alone in Donegal. He wanted to plant his potatoes, but it was very hard work and he had no modern equipment. His only son who used to help him was in prison for murder. The old man wrote a letter to his son and described his predicament.

Dear Son
I am feeling pretty bad because it looks like I won't be able to plant my potatoes this year,i wont be able to dig the field up. I am getting too old to be doing this by myself. If you were here all my troubles would be over.
Love
Dad

A few days later he received a letter from his son.

Dear Dad
For Heavens sake don't dig up the field. That is where I buried all the bodies

Love
your son

At 4 am the next morning Garda Síochána forensic teams and other local police showed up and dug up the entire field without finding any bodies.
They apologized to the old man and left
That same day the old man received another letter from his son.

Dear Dad
You can go ahead and plant your potatoes now.

Boots

A lady went in a bar in Texas and saw a cowboy with his feet propped up on the table.
He had the biggest feet she had ever seen.
The woman asked the cowboy is it true what they say about men with big feet?
The cowboy said Shore is little lady.why don't you come out to the bunkhouse and let me prove it to you.
The woman wanted to find out for herself so she spent the night with the cowboy. The next morning she handed him a $100 bill.
Blushing he said, "Well thankee ma'am, Ah'm real flattered. Aint nobody ever paid me for my services before.
The woman replied don't be flattered take the money and buy boots that fit !!!

Harley v women

Arthur Davidson the inventor of the Harley Davidson motorcycle dies and goes to Heaven At the gate St Peter tells Arthur you have been such a good man and your motorcycles have changed the world.
Your reward is you can hang out with anyone in Heaven.
Arthur thinks for a minute and says I want to hang out with God.
St Peter takes Arthur to meet God.
God recognizes Arthur and says "ok so you are the man who invented the motorcycle".
Arthur says yep thats me.
God says whats the big deal in inventing something that is pretty unstable, makes noise and pollution and can't run without a road?
Arthur is apparently embarrassed but finally says, "Excuse me but aren't you the inventor of the woman?
yes says God
Well says Arthur professional to professional you have some major design flaws in your invention.
1. Too much inconsistency in the front end protrusions
2. It chatters constantly at high speeds.
3. Most of the rear ends are too soft and wobble too much.
4. The intake is placed way too close to the exhaust.
5. And maintenance costs are enormous

Hmmmmmmmm you have some good points there replies God but hold on.
God goes to His celestial super computer types in a few words and waits for the results. The computer prints out a slip of paper and God reads it,then turns to Artur and says

Well it may be true that my invention is flawed but according to these numbers more men are riding my invention that yours!!!

Insane or not ?

A doctor visited a California Mental Institution and asked a patient. "How did you get put here?"

He was his reply

It started when I got married and I guess I never should of done it, I got hitched to a widow with a grown daughter who then became my step-daughter.

My daddy came to visit and fell in love with my lovely step-daughter, then maried her. and so now my step-daughter was now my step-mother

Soon my wife had a son who was of course my daddy's brother-in-law since he is the half brother of my step-daughter who is now of course my daddy's wife.
So as I told you when my step-daughter married my daddy she was my step-mother. Now since my new son is brother to my step-mother he also became my uncle.

As you know my wife is my step-grandmother, she is my step-mothers mother. (Don't forget my step-mother is my step-daughter) Remember to I am my wifes grandson.
But hold on just a few minutes more. You see since I am married to my step-grandmother I am not only my wifes grandson and her hubby but I am also my own grandfather

Now you can understand how I got put in this place.
